Texts.Chs: 针对疫苗的基因组标记进行了二十次以上的实验后，我们还是没有找到引起实验鼠C7暴怒，疯狂，无动机的杀害吞噬同类的原因。它的细胞内没有任何病毒存在，而且我们从它的生理行为中没有发现任何的异常现象。
Texts.Eng: After twenty assorted tests on the genome markers for this curative agent, we were unable to determine what caused C7 to go ballistic and attack, kill, mutilate and devour the other rats at random. The viral load in his cells is not present, nor is there any trace of change in his physiology.

Texts.Chs: 格雷格今天开始表现得有点不正常。他的讲话方式有些问题。他一直在重复一些很轻的话语，具体是什么我说不清楚，但是我会一直留意他的。同时我也在设法分离出那种奇异粒子并且尝试中和实验鼠C7身上的粒子。两个小时前我已经把抗体注射进了它体内，现在我开始观察它接下来会发生什么反应
Texts.Eng: Greg started acting a bit off today. I can't quite put my finger on it. Something is up with his speech patterns. It's slight, but there. I'll keep an eye on him. In the meantime I have managed to isolate the strange particle and neutralize it in subject C7. Two hours ago I administered antibodies into her, and now I wait to see what happens.

Texts.Chs: 我终于逼格雷格承认了实情：是他把那种奇怪的液体混合进了疫苗里。据他所说，测试表明它对生物样品的影响是惊人的，如果这个效果意味着能够保障我们物种的安全，就值得一试。说这话的时候他看起来有过于戒备，尽管我保证以他的力量没有能力引起任何管理上的麻烦。
Texts.Eng: I got Greg to admit it: He put that weird fluid in his mix. According to him, testing showed that the effect it has on biological samples is astounding and was worth a test if it meant the safety of our species. He seems a bit overly defensive , despite my assurances that he was not in any form of administrative trouble.

Texts.Chs: 实验鼠C7，注射抗体后的观察报告          第一时间：受试样本良好 4小时：受试样本经过37秒后开始痛苦翻滚 4小时14分钟：受试样本完全脑死亡，但是其他的生物机能运行正常
Texts.Eng: Subject C7 , when injected with antibodies: At first subject seemed fine. At four-hours, thirty seven seconds after injection the subject began to writhe in agony. After 14 minutes, subject appeared to suffer complete and total brain-death, though other biological functions remain operational.

Texts.Chs: 虽然这花费了我们几周的时间，但是我们终于排查出了问题。一种快速变异的粒子，它小到甚至能够躲过电子显微镜的检测。就是这种粒子病变了整个疫苗样本。我们还不清楚它的来源，但是根据我的推断格雷格把那种未知液体混合进疫苗里似乎是引起这件事最有可能的原因。
Texts.Eng: While it took weeks, we have isolated the problem. Some sort of rapidly mutating particle, so small as to be undetectable even in the electron microscope, has tainted the main sample. The source of this particle remains largely unknown, though my theory that Greg mixed some of that fluid into his batch seems the most likely cause.
